application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Deatils required for condition 16 (Construction Management Plan) of planning application 20/02213/FUL (Partial demolition of the existing Roupell House building and erection of a part 3-storey, part 4-storey building comprising 23 residential units with associated landscaping, refuse and cycle storage, public pathway improvements to the eastern boundary and landscaping improvements to the existing communal amenity space to the rear of 37-40 York Road (Dale Court).
decision_conditions: The Validation Local List requires Time Stamped Photographs of the site to be provided with the application submission. Please see the Local List for further guidance and submit these.
